org.knopflerfish.ant.taskdefs.bundle
Class BundleArchives

java.lang.Object
  org.knopflerfish.ant.taskdefs.bundle.BundleArchives
public class BundleArchives
extends java.lang.Object

A class that analyzes all bundle jar files given by a list of resource collections (file sets).

          Path prefix for source files included into the bundle archive.
 
Constructor Summary

          Traverse the given list of resource collections and create BundleArchive-objects for all bundle jars found.

          Traverse the given list of resource collections and create BundleArchive-objects for all bundle jars found.

Constructor Detail

BundleArchives

public BundleArchives(org.apache.tools.ant.Task task,
                      java.util.List resourceCollections)
Traverse the given list of resource collections and create BundleArchive-objects for all bundle jars found.

Parameters:
task - The task that uses this class, used for logging and project access.
resourceCollections - The collection of resource collections selecting the bundle archives to load.

BundleArchives

public BundleArchives(org.apache.tools.ant.Task task,
                      java.util.List resourceCollections,
                      boolean parseExportImport)
Traverse the given list of resource collections and create BundleArchive-objects for all bundle jars found.

Parameters:
task - The task that uses this class, used for logging and project access.
resourceCollections - The collection of resource collections selecting the bundle archives to load.
parseExportImport - If true then the created bundle archive objects will parse the import / export package / service headers.
